CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Different numbers of thienyl ( T ) as spacers were introduced along the copolymer main chain to investigate the effect on optical , electrochemical and photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

1. "thienyl (T)" - this is the first and only instance of a material name in the paragraph. Thienyl is a chemical group that can be used as a building block in the synthesis of polymers. In this case, it is being used as a spacer along the copolymer main chain.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.
1. "thienyl (T)" - this is the only relevant material name in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Different numbers of thienyl ( T ) as spacers were introduced along the copolymer main chain to investigate the effect on optical , electrochemical and photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

1. "numbers of thienyl (T)" - This is a "Property Name" entity as it refers to the quantity or amount of a specific component (thienyl) in the copolymer main chain.
2. "optical" - This is also a "Property Name" entity as it refers to a property or characteristic of the copolymer related to the transmission and absorption of light.
3. "electrochemical" - This is a "Property Name" entity as it refers to a property or characteristic of the copolymer related to its ability to undergo chemical reactions when a voltage is applied.
4. "photovoltaic performance" - This is a "Property Name" entity as it refers to the ability of the copolymer to convert light into electrical energy, which is a desirable property for solar cell applications.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. "numbers of thienyl (T)" - This is a "Property Name" entity as it refers to the quantity or amount of a specific component (thienyl) in the copolymer main chain.
2. "optical" - This is a "Property Name" entity as it refers to a property or characteristic of the copolymer related to the transmission and absorption of light.
3. "electrochemical" - This is a "Property Name" entity as it refers to a property or characteristic of the copolymer related to its ability to undergo chemical reactions when a voltage is applied.
4. "photovoltaic performance" - This is a "Property Name" entity as it refers to the ability of the copolymer to convert light into electrical energy, which is a desirable property for solar cell applications.

I have removed irrelevant entities and only kept the entities that clearly refer to Material Properties.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Different numbers of thienyl ( T ) as spacers were introduced along the copolymer main chain to investigate the effect on optical , electrochemical and photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

1. "optical" - This is the first potential "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.
2. "electrochemical" - This is another potential "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.
3. "photovoltaic" - This is the third potential "Property Value" entity in the paragraph.

These three entities are the properties of the copolymer that are being investigated in the experiment described in the paragraph. The researchers are looking at how changing the number of thienyl (T) spacers along the copolymer main chain affects these three properties.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. "optical"
2. "electrochemical"
3. "photovoltaic"

These three entities are the relevant "Property Value" entities in the paragraph. They clearly refer to the values of material properties that are being investigated in the experiment described in the paragraph. The other entities in the paragraph, such as "numbers of thienyl (T)" and "copolymer main chain," are not "Property Value" entities, but rather describe the variables being manipulated in the experiment.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
